overall_assessment: The sector shows significant potential for digital transformation but is currently hindered by low digital scores and limited resources.
key_insight: The sector's strengths in social media engagement and community collaboration can be harnessed to improve digital presence and capabilities collectively.

recommendations.title: Establish a Peer Learning Network
recommendations.description: Create a peer learning network where businesses can share experiences, challenges, and successes related to digital transformation. This will foster a culture of collaboration and support among sector participants.
recommendations.approach: Utilize WhatsApp groups or local meetups to facilitate regular discussions and knowledge sharing.
immediate_actions: Identify key participants to lead discussions
Set a regular schedule for meetings
Encourage sharing of digital tools and strategies that work.
recommendations.long_term_vision: In 1-2 years, businesses will have improved their digital scores collectively, with a stronger support network in place.
recommendations.who_leads: Sector associations or a volunteer group of engaged businesses
recommendations.estimated_reach: All 13 businesses could participate and benefit.

recommendations.title: Collective Marketing Campaigns
recommendations.description: Develop collective marketing initiatives that leverage the strengths of social media presence to promote festivals and cultural events. This can improve visibility while sharing costs and resources.
recommendations.approach: Collaborate to create joint social media campaigns, showcasing multiple events under one umbrella to attract a wider audience.
immediate_actions: Host a brainstorming session to identify common themes
Assign roles for content creation and distribution.
recommendations.long_term_vision: In 1-2 years, the sector will see increased attendance at events, improved brand recognition, and higher engagement on social media.
recommendations.who_leads: A designated marketing committee from the sector associations
recommendations.estimated_reach: Potentially all 13 businesses as part of the campaigns.

recommendations.title: Workshops on Digital Skills Development
recommendations.description: Organize workshops focused on enhancing digital skills among festival and event organizers, addressing areas like website creation, content marketing, and social media engagement.
recommendations.approach: Collaborate with local tech experts, NGOs, or educational institutions to provide training sessions tailored to the sector's needs.
immediate_actions: Identify local experts willing to volunteer their time
recommendations.long_term_vision: Over 1-2 years, participants will gain essential digital skills, allowing them to independently manage and enhance their online presence.
recommendations.who_leads: Local educational institutions or NGOs in partnership with sector associations
recommendations.estimated_reach: Approximately 10-12 businesses can participate in each workshop.

recommendations.title: Creating a Shared Resource Hub
recommendations.description: Establish a shared online resource hub where businesses can access templates, guides, and best practices for digital marketing and event management.
recommendations.approach: Develop a simple website or a shared Google Drive folder that can be collaboratively populated and updated by participants.
recommendations.long_term_vision: In 1-2 years, the hub will serve as a go-to resource for all businesses, improving overall digital literacy and practices.
recommendations.who_leads: Sector association or a volunteer task force from the businesses
recommendations.estimated_reach: All 13 businesses can access and contribute to the hub.

recommendations.title: Develop Sector-wide Standards and Best Practices
recommendations.description: Collaboratively develop a set of digital marketing standards and best practices tailored to the unique context of The Gambia's festivals and cultural events sector.
recommendations.approach: Facilitate workshops where participants can discuss and agree on practical standards for digital engagement, ensuring they are realistic and achievable.
immediate_actions: Conduct a survey to identify existing practices
Organize a workshop to draft and refine standards
Create a simple guide for all members.
recommendations.long_term_vision: In 1-2 years, the sector will have a clear set of standards that improve digital consistency and professionalism among businesses.
recommendations.who_leads: Sector associations with input from all businesses
recommendations.estimated_reach: All 13 businesses will benefit from the established standards.
